essential.name: Title Screen
essential.prompt: Heroic 16-bit SNES theme, adventurous and uplifting, pixel art video game style, French bulldog protagonist vibes, neighborhood adventure, catchy melody with orchestral samples, retro Super Nintendo era inspired, rich layered synth, 120 BPM, instrumental, seamless loop, 90 seconds

essential.name: Neighborhood Zone
essential.prompt: Cheerful 16-bit SNES exploration theme, sunny suburban afternoon, pixel art RPG overworld music, light and bouncy, playful melody with sampled percussion, cozy neighborhood vibes, Super Nintendo soundtrack style, warm synth pads, 100 BPM, instrumental, perfect loop, 2 minutes

essential.name: Backyard Zone
essential.prompt: Tense 16-bit SNES exploration theme, slightly ominous but adventurous, overgrown backyard mystery, pixel art action RPG, deeper sampled bass, suspenseful Super Nintendo style, prowling through shadows, layered atmosphere, 90 BPM, instrumental, seamless loop, 2 minutes

essential.name: Combat Music
essential.prompt: Intense 16-bit SNES battle theme, fast-paced action RPG combat, pixel art boss fight energy, driving sampled drums and aggressive synth leads, heroic dog vs raccoon battle, urgent and exciting, Super Nintendo fighter style, 140 BPM, instrumental, perfect loop, 90 seconds

essential.name: Game Over
essential.prompt: Melancholic 16-bit SNES game over theme, short and somber, pixel art defeat music, slow descending melody, bittersweet Super Nintendo style, orchestral samples, hopeful ending note suggesting retry, 70 BPM, instrumental, no loop, 20 seconds

essential.name: Victory Fanfare
essential.prompt: Triumphant 16-bit SNES victory fanfare, short celebratory jingle, pixel art RPG level complete, ascending cheerful melody with brass samples, retro Super Nintendo achievement sound, heroic and satisfying, instrumental, no loop, 15 seconds

essential.name: Pause Menu
essential.prompt: Calm ambient 16-bit SNES theme, muted and relaxed, pixel art game pause screen, gentle arpeggios with soft pads, Super Nintendo holding pattern, peaceful break from action, subtle and unobtrusive, 80 BPM, instrumental, seamless loop, 60 seconds
